body: I've just seen it again in https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/1320, so probably not: https://sponge.corp.google.com/target?id=f147dbb5-5775-4265-bd2c-918d36d1e7f7&target=github/grpc/c%2B%2B_linux_tsan_native&searchFor=&show=ALL&sortBy=STATUS
